snippet: Athletics department administrators ordered that a woman be hired over a man as an assistant track coach, no matter their qualifications, an email written by the head coach alleged.
lead_paragraph: Athletics department administrators ordered that a woman be hired over a man as an assistant track coach, no matter their qualifications, an email written by the head coach alleged.

headline.main: Email Released in Iowa Bias Case
headline.print_headline: Email Released in Iowa Bias Case
